scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && npx terser 'blog page.js' -o 'dist/blog page.min.js' && npx terser 'home page.js' -o 'dist/home page.min.js' && npx terser 'portfolio page.js' -o 'dist/portfolio page.min.js' && npx terser 'resume page.js' -o 'dist/resume page.min.js' && npx cleancss 'blog page.css' -o 'dist/blog page.min.css' && npx cleancss 'home page.css' -o 'dist/home page.min.css' && npx cleancss 'portfolio page.css' -o 'dist/portfolio page.min.css' && npx cleancss 'resume page.css' -o 'dist/resume page.min.css' && npx html-minifier-terser blog.html -o 'dist/blog.min.html' --minify-css --minify-js --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser 'home page.html' -o 'dist/home.min.html' --minify-css --minify-js --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser index.html -o 'dist/index.min.html' --minify-css --minify-js --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser portfolio.html -o 'dist/portfolio.min.html' --minify-css --minify-js --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx html-minifier-terser resume.html -o 'dist/resume.min.html' --minify-css --minify-js --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && npx cpy-cli 'assets/**/*' dist/assets && npx cpy-cli 'favicon-32x32.png' 'apple-touch-icon.png' 'favicon-16x16.png' 'site.webmanifest' 'android-chrome-192x192.png' 'android-chrome-512x512.png' 'favicon.ico' dist/
